name: Don't Touch The Red (SOKU)
description:
Don't Touch The Red is a platform game with 5 levels, in which you play as a cube and you will have to avoid all that is red.

Controls :

- Use the directional arrows to move around.

- Press space or the up arrow to jump.

- Press space twice or the up arrow to make a double jump.

- Press space + right arrow or up arrow + right arrow to climb the wall to your right.

- Press space or the up arrow to climb up the wall to your left.

This is my first game, so be indulgent in your Reviews. ;)
